summary: New textures for werewolves. More fur, wolf-style color for head.
descriptionHtml:
New textures for werewolves. More fur, wolf-style color for head.


To install simpy copy the Data folder into Skyrim folder over existing one.

If you ever replaced textrures for glass armor before, it will ask for rewriting previous files.

To uninstall mod delete modifed files from Data/textures/actors/character/werewolf folder (or delete entire \'werewolf\' folder) of Skyrim.

List of modifed files:
werewolf/
 werewolfbody.dds
 werewolfbody_sk.dds
 werewolfhead.dds
 werewolfhead_n.dds
 werewolfhead_sk.dds

Enjoy!
author: MikoYork
